tool_description: An API for information about the Top Chess players in the world
name: ChessPlayersAPI
title: ChessPlayersAPI

api_list.name: FindAll
api_list.description: Endpoint to grab all chess players in the database in order of their rank

api_list.name: Filter
api_list.description: This allows you to filter the chess players by federation, minimum ranking and maximum ranking

api_list.name: FindPlayerByName
api_list.description: Find the player your looking for by searching their name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chessplayersapi.p.rapidapi.com/findbyname/Magnus Carlsen"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chessplayersapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chessplayersapi.p.rapidapi.com/findbyname/{fullname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chessplayersapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetPlayerByRanking
api_list.description: This endpoint allows users to enter a ranking and it will return the corresponding player

api_list.name: GetTop10Ranked
api_list.description: Endpoint to retrieve only the top 10 ranked players in the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chessplayersapi.p.rapidapi.com/players/getTop10Ranked"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chessplayersapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: FindByFederation
api_list.description: Returns all the chess players who below to a certain federation e.g. Norway
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chessplayersapi.p.rapidapi.com/players/findbyfederation/Norway"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chessplayersapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chessplayersapi.p.rapidapi.com/players/findbyfederation/{federation}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chessplayersapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
